Description: Rim sherd (with turn of wall) of Attic black-glazed pottery cup with slightly concave lip, offset inside and out; wholly glazed; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The sherd possibly belongs to the same vase as British Museum 1886,0401.568.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 97)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 648, no. 59)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1611)
